<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">static</span> <span class="n">soinfo</span><span class="o">*</span> <span class="nf">find_library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="kt">char</span><span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="k">static</span> <span class="n">soinfo</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">find_library_internal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">somain</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">soinfo</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">si</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">find_loaded_library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">flags</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">FLAG_LINKED</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;OOPS: recursive link to </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">TRACE</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;[ &#39;%s&#39; has not been loaded yet. Locating...]&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// At this point we know that whatever is loaded @ base is a valid ELF
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// shared library whose segments are properly mapped in.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">TRACE</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;[ init_library base=0x%08x sz=0x%08x name=&#39;%s&#39; ]&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">base</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="n">soinfo_link_image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">munmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">reinterpret_cast</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">base</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">soinfo_free</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>find_library函数调用load_library函数进行so的加载,然后通过soinfo_link_image函数完成so的链接过程.</p>
<p>跟踪load_library函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5

</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c++" data-lang="c++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">static</span> <span class="n">soinfo</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="nf">load_library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Open the file.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">fd</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">open_library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fd</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;library </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> not found&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Read the ELF header and load the segments.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span> <span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fd</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">Load</span><span class="p">())</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">bname</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">strrchr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="sc">&#39;/&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">soinfo</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">si</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">soinfo_alloc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">bname</span> <span class="o">?</span> <span class="n">bname</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">:</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">si</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">base</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">load_start</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">load_size</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">load_bias</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">load_bias</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">flags</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">entry</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">dynamic</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">phnum</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">phdr_count</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">si</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">elf_reader</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">loaded_phdr</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">si</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数先通过open_library打开so文件,拿到一个文件描述符,然后创建ElfReader对象,通过elf_reader.Load函数进行结构填充,最后将elf_reader读取到的结构赋值给si当做结果返回.</p>
<p>跟踪elf_reader.Load函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">Load</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">ReadElfHeader</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">VerifyElfHeader</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ReadProgramHeader</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ReserveAddressSpace</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">LoadSegments</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">FindPhdr</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>接下来分别跟踪上述函数进行分析so加载流程.</p>
<p>跟踪ReadElfHeader函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">Elf32_Ehdr</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">ReadElfHeader</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ssize_t</span> <span class="n">rc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">read</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fd_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">)));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rc</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;can&#39;t read file </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">: %s&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">strerror</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">errno</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rc</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> is too small to be an ELF executable&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数主要从文件中读取<code>header_</code>结构体大小的字节数据到<code>header_</code>中,而<code>header_</code>的类型为Elf32_Ehdr</p>
<p>跟踪VerifyElfHeader函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span><span class="lnt">36
</span><span class="lnt">37
</span><span class="lnt">38
</span><span class="lnt">39
</span><span class="lnt">40
</span><span class="lnt">41
</span><span class="lnt">42
</span><span class="lnt">43
</span><span class="lnt">44
</span><span class="lnt">45
</span><span class="lnt">46
</span><span class="lnt">47
</span><span class="lnt">48
</span><span class="lnt">49
</span><span class="lnt">50
</span><span class="lnt">51
</span><span class="lnt">52
</span><span class="lnt">53
</span><span class="lnt">54
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">VerifyElfHeader</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//判断ELF魔术头
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_MAG0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ELFMAG0</span> <span class="o">||</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_MAG1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ELFMAG1</span> <span class="o">||</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_MAG2</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ELFMAG2</span> <span class="o">||</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_MAG3</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ELFMAG3</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> has bad ELF magic&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//判断是否为32位so
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_CLASS</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ELFCLASS32</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> not 32-bit: %d&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_CLASS</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//判断是否为小端序
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_DATA</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ELFDATA2LSB</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> not little-endian: %d&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_ident</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">EI_DATA</span><span class="p">]);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="c1">//判断文件类型是否为共享目标文件
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_type</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ET_DYN</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> has unexpected e_type: %d&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_type</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="c1">//判断ELF版本
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_version</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">EV_CURRENT</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> has unexpected e_version: %d&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_version</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="c1">//检查目标体系结构类型
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_machine</span> <span class="o">!=</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#ifdef ANDROID_ARM_LINKER
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span> <span class="n">EM_ARM</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#elif defined(ANDROID_MIPS_LINKER)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span> <span class="n">EM_MIPS</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#elif defined(ANDROID_X86_LINKER)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span> <span class="n">EM_386</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#endif
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span> <span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> has unexpected e_machine: %d&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_machine</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数对程序头部的字段取值进行了限制,只有都符合要求时才返回true</p>
<p>跟踪ReadProgramHeader函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">ReadProgramHeader</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">phdr_num_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_phnum</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Like the kernel, we only accept program header tables that
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// are smaller than 64KiB.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr_num_</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="n">phdr_num_</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">65536</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> has invalid e_phnum: %d&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">phdr_num_</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">page_min</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_START</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_phoff</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">page_max</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_END</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_phoff</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr_num_</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="k">sizeof</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span><span class="p">)));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">page_offset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_OFFSET</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">header_</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">e_phoff</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">phdr_size_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">page_max</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">page_min</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">mmap_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">phdr_size_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PROT_READ</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">MAP_PRIVATE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fd_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">page_min</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mmap_result</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">MAP_FAILED</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> phdr mmap failed: %s&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">strerror</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">errno</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">phdr_mmap_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmap_result</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">phdr_table_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">reinterpret_cast</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">reinterpret_cast</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="kt">char</span> <span class="o">*&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mmap_result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">page_offset</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数首先读取程序头表表项数量、检查程序头表大小合法性,然后将ELF文件映射到足够存储程序头大小的内存,最后通过偏移给phdr_table_赋值指向程序头的指针.</p>
<p>跟踪ReserveAddressSpace函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">ReserveAddressSpace</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">load_size_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr_table_get_load_size</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr_table_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">phdr_num_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">load_size_</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> has no loadable segments&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">uint8_t</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">addr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">reinterpret_cast</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="kt">uint8_t</span> <span class="o">*&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">mmap_flags</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MAP_PRIVATE</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">MAP_ANONYMOUS</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">addr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">load_size_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PROT_NONE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mmap_flags</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">start</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">MAP_FAILED</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;couldn&#39;t reserve %d bytes of address space for </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">load_size_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">load_start_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">start</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">load_bias_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">reinterpret_cast</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="kt">uint8_t</span> <span class="o">*&gt;</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">start</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">addr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数主要是计算处so文件中需要加载到内存的PT_LOAD段的总大小,并开辟相应大小的内存空间.</p>
<div class="details admonition tip open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-regular fa-lightbulb" aria-hidden="true"></i>技巧<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><code>load_bias_</code>是偏移值,假设so文件中某PT_LOAD段的开始虚拟地址addr = 0x100,而实际上的加载地址start = 0x1000,那么当寻找0x300这个地方的数据时,实际的操作为0x1000 + 0x300 - 0x100,也就是0x300 + 0x1000 - 0x100即0x300 + start - addr.<code>load_bias_</code>为start和addr的差值,当需要得到内存中的真实地址时,只需加上这个偏移即可.</div>
 </div>
</div>
<p>跟踪ReserveAddressSpace函数内的phdr_table_get_load_size如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span><span class="lnt">36
</span><span class="lnt">37
</span><span class="lnt">38
</span><span class="lnt">39
</span><span class="lnt">40
</span><span class="lnt">41
</span><span class="lnt">42
</span><span class="lnt">43
</span><span class="lnt">44
</span><span class="lnt">45
</span><span class="lnt">46
</span><span class="lnt">47
</span><span class="lnt">48
</span><span class="lnt">49
</span><span class="lnt">50
</span><span class="lnt">51
</span><span class="lnt">52
</span><span class="lnt">53
</span><span class="lnt">54
</span><span class="lnt">55
</span><span class="lnt">56
</span><span class="lnt">57
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">size_t</span> <span class="nf">phdr_table_get_load_size</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">phdr_table</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">size_t</span> <span class="n">phdr_count</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">out_min_vaddr</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">out_max_vaddr</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0xFFFFFFFFU</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">max_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x00000000U</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//寻求PT_LOAD段的标志位
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">found_pt_load</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//遍历程序头表中的每一个段
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">phdr_count</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//获取每个段的指针phdr
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">phdr_table</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//如果类型不是PT_LOAD则继续遍历,只有PT_LOAD段才需要载入内存
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_type</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">PT_LOAD</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">continue</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">found_pt_load</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//找到所有PT_LOAD段中的最小开始地址
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">		<span class="c1">//找到所有PT_LOAD段中的最大结束地址
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_memsz</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">max_vaddr</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">max_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_memsz</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//如果没有找到PT_LOAD段,最小地址为0
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="n">found_pt_load</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x00000000U</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//进行页对齐
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_START</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">max_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_END</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">max_vaddr</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">out_min_vaddr</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">out_min_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">out_max_vaddr</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">out_max_vaddr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">max_vaddr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">max_vaddr</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">min_vaddr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数主要是获取so文件中包含所有PT_LOAD段的最小地址和最大地址,并在页对齐后求出所有段占用的大小.</p>
<p>跟踪LoadSegments函数如下:</p>

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">LoadSegments</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">size_t</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">phdr_num_</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">phdr_table_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_type</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">PT_LOAD</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">continue</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Segment addresses in memory.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">seg_start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">load_bias_</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">seg_end</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">seg_start</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_memsz</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">seg_page_start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_START</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_start</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">seg_page_end</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_END</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_end</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">seg_file_end</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">seg_start</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_filesz</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// File offsets.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">file_start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_offset</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">file_end</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">file_start</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_filesz</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">file_page_start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_START</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file_start</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">file_length</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">file_end</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">file_page_start</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file_length</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">seg_addr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmap</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">seg_page_start</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">file_length</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">PFLAGS_TO_PROT</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_flags</span><span class="p">),</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">MAP_FIXED</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">MAP_PRIVATE</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">fd_</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">file_page_start</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_addr</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">MAP_FAILED</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;couldn&#39;t map </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> segment %d: %s&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">strerror</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">errno</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// if the segment is writable, and does not end on a page boundary,
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// zero-fill it until the page limit.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">((</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_flags</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">PF_W</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">PAGE_OFFSET</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">memset</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">PAGE_SIZE</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">PAGE_OFFSET</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">seg_file_end</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">PAGE_END</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// seg_file_end is now the first page address after the file
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// content. If seg_end is larger, we need to zero anything
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// between them. This is done by using a private anonymous
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// map for all extra pages.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">seg_page_end</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">zeromap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmap</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">seg_page_end</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">seg_file_end</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">PFLAGS_TO_PROT</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_flags</span><span class="p">),</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">MAP_FIXED</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">MAP_ANONYMOUS</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">MAP_PRIVATE</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">zeromap</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">MAP_FAILED</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;couldn&#39;t zero fill </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s"> gap: %s&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">strerror</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">errno</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数主要是遍历每一个PT_LOAD段,将文件中的段按照ReserveAddressSpace函数计算出来的内存空间范围进行加载,并对其进行额外的0填充等操作.</p>
<p>跟踪FindPhdr函数如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//http://androidxref.com/4.4.4_r1/xref/bionic/linker/linker_phdr.cpp
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="kt">bool</span> <span class="n">ElfReader</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">FindPhdr</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">phdr_limit</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr_table_</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr_num_</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// If there is a PT_PHDR, use it directly.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr_table_</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">phdr_limit</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">PT_PHDR</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">CheckPhdr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">load_bias_</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Otherwise, check the first loadable segment. If its file offset
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// is 0, it starts with the ELF header, and we can trivially find the
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">// loaded program header from it.
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Phdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phdr_table_</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">phdr</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">phdr_limit</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="o">++</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">PT_LOAD</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_offset</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">elf_addr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_bias_</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">phdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">p_vaddr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Ehdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">ehdr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="k">const</span> <span class="n">Elf32_Ehdr</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)(</span><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">elf_addr</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span> <span class="n">offset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ehdr</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">e_phoff</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">CheckPhdr</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">Elf32_Addr</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">ehdr</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">offset</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">break</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">DL_ERR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;can&#39;t find loaded phdr for </span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">%s</span><span class="se">\&#34;</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name_</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该函数主要是寻找PT_PHDR段并校验,此段指明了段表本身的位置和大小,CheckPhdr函数主要是判断PT_LOAD段是否全部在被加载的内存空间范围内.</p>
<p>so的加载流程主要是根据so的文件信息,先读取so的头部信息进行验证,然后找到程序头的位置,遍历段表的每一个段,根据PT_LOAD段指定的信息将so进行加载.</p>
