</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.AndroidEmulator</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.Emulator</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.LibraryResolver</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.Module</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.arm.HookStatus</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.arm.backend.DynarmicFactory</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.arm.backend.Unicorn2Factory</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.arm.context.RegisterContext</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.debugger.BreakPointCallback</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.debugger.DebuggerType</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.hook.HookContext</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.hook.ReplaceCallback</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.hook.hookzz.*</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.hook.xhook.IxHook</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.linux.android.AndroidEmulatorBuilder</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.linux.android.AndroidResolver</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.linux.android.XHookImpl</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.linux.android.dvm.*</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.linux.android.dvm.jni.ProxyDvmObject</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.memory.Memory</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.pointer.UnidbgPointer</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">com.github.unidbg.virtualmodule.android.AndroidModule</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">unicorn.Unicorn</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">java.io.File</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kd">public</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">class</span> <span class="nc">MainActivity</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">extends</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">AbstractJni</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">public</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">static</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">void</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="o">[]</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">MainActivity</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">mainActivity</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">MainActivity</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">mainActivity</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">call_func</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">private</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">final</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">AndroidEmulator</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">private</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">final</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">VM</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">private</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">final</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">Module</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">module</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">private</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">MainActivity</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//1.创建Android模拟器实例</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">AndroidEmulatorBuilder</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">for64Bit</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">addBackendFactory</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">Unicorn2Factory</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">build</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//2.获取操作内存的接口</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">Memory</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">memory</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">getMemory</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//3.设置Android SDK 版本</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">LibraryResolver</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">resolver</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">AndroidResolver</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">23</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">memory</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">setLibraryResolver</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">resolver</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//4.创建虚拟机</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">createDalvikVM</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">File</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;unidbg-android/src/test/java/com/example/luodst/files/app-debug.apk&#34;</span><span class="p">));</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//5.是否打印日志</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">setVerbose</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//6.设置jni</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">setJni</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">AndroidModule</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="na">register</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">memory</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//7.加载目标so文件</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">DalvikModule</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">dm</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">loadLibrary</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;luodst&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//8.将so文件对应的Module存入成员变量</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">module</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">dm</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">getModule</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//9.调用JNI_OnLoad</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">dm</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">callJNI_OnLoad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">private</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">void</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">call_func</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">attach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">DebuggerType</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">CONSOLE</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="na">addBreakPoint</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">base</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">+</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">0x1648</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">BreakPointCallback</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nd">@Override</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">public</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">boolean</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">onHit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Emulator</span><span class="o">&lt;?&gt;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">long</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">address</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//修改寄存器等操作</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//返回false则继续断下,返回true则不断下</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">return</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">});</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//执行JNI方法</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">DvmObject</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">obj</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">ProxyDvmObject</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">createObject</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">vm</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//DvmObject obj = vm.resolveClass(&#34;com.example.luodst.MainActivity&#34;).newObject(null);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">nRet</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">obj</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">callJniMethodInt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">emulator</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s">&#34;add(II)I&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">5</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">out</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">println</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nRet</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="参考链接" class="heading-element"><span>参考链接</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>&lt;Unidbg逆向工程 原理与实践&gt;</p>

item.title: x64Dbg-命令详解
item.description:
<img src="https://XiaLuoHun.top/posts/x64dbg/x64dbg-%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4%E8%AF%A6%E8%A7%A3/images/x64Dbg.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="值" class="heading-element"><span>值</span>
 <a href="#%e5%80%bc" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>很多命令都接受表达式和值作为参数.下面是所有受支持的数值:</p>
<h3 id="数字" class="heading-element"><span>数字</span>
 <a href="#%e6%95%b0%e5%ad%97" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>默认情况下,所有数字都解释为16进制,也可以在值前加x或0x作为前缀来表明该数值为16进制.</p>
<p>如果想要该数字解释为10进制,可以在数字前面加一个点: .123 = 7B</p>
<h3 id="变量" class="heading-element"><span>变量</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>变量可以选择以<code>$</code>开头,并且只能存储一个DWORD(在x64上为QWORD).这意味着<code>myvar</code>和<code>$myvar</code>是等同的.</p>
<h3 id="寄存器" class="heading-element"><span>寄存器</span>
 <a href="#%e5%af%84%e5%ad%98%e5%99%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>除浮点寄存器外的所有寄存器(如RAX、EAX、AL)都可以用作变量.</p>
<p>像XMM0、YMM0以及ST(0)这样的浮点寄存器不能用作变量使用,但它们可以通过字符串格式的浮点类型进行记录.目前不支持AVX-512寄存器.</p>
<div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><ul>
<li>除以下寄存器外,大多数寄存器的变量名称和它们的名称相同</li>
<li>x86控制字标志被命名为_x87CW_UM</li>
<li>除架构中的寄存器外,x64Dbg还提供了以下寄存器:CAX、CBX、CCX、CDX、CSP、CBP、CSI、CDI、CIP.这些寄存器在32位平台上映射为32位寄存器,在64位平台上映射为64位寄存器</li>
</ul>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h3 id="标志" class="heading-element"><span>标志</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a0%87%e5%bf%97" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>调试标志可以作为输入,在标志名称前加_即为有效输入.示例如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">_cf、_pf、_af、_zf、_sf、_tf、_if、_df、_of、_rf、_vm _ac、_vif、_vip以及_id</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="内存位置" class="heading-element"><span>内存位置</span>
 <a href="#%e5%86%85%e5%ad%98%e4%bd%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>可以使用以下表达式对内存位置进行读取或写入.</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr指向的内存读取4或8字节内容</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">n:[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr指向的内存读取n字节内容</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">seg:[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr的段读取DWORD或QWORD大小内容</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">byte:[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr指向的内存读取1字节内容</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">word:[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr指向的内存读取2字节内容</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dword:[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr指向的内存读取4字节内容</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">qword:[addr]</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr指向的内存读取8字节内容</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><ul>
<li>n是要读取的字节数,在x32上应小于4,在x64上应小于8,否则会出错</li>
<li>seg可以是gs、es、cs、fs、ds以及ss.只有fs和gs有效</li>
</ul>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h3 id="标签符号" class="heading-element"><span>标签/符号</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a0%87%e7%ad%be%e7%ac%a6%e5%8f%b7" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>用户定义的标签和符号是一个有效的表达式(它们解析到所述标签/符号的地址).</p>
<h3 id="dll导出" class="heading-element"><span>DLL导出</span>
 <a href="#dll%e5%af%bc%e5%87%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>从指定模块获取API地址可以使用module.dll:api、module:api或module:ordinal</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">ntdll</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nl">dll</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">ZwContinue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nl">ntdll</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">memcmp</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">ntdll</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">memcmp</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nl">ntdll</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="nl">D</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">LuoExport</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><ul>
<li>当module为空字符串时,将默认为当前CPU窗口显示的模块</li>
<li>使用.或:是等价的</li>
</ul>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h3 id="模块基地址" class="heading-element"><span>模块基地址</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a8%a1%e5%9d%97%e5%9f%ba%e5%9c%b0%e5%9d%80" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>可以使用下述命令来获取模块的基地址.</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">module、module:0、module:base、module:imagebase、module:header</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="rva文件偏移" class="heading-element"><span>RVA/文件偏移</span>
 <a href="#rva%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e5%81%8f%e7%a7%bb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>RVA-&gt;VA:module+rva或module:$rva</li>
<li>FOA-&gt;VA:module:#offset</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c++" data-lang="c++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//RVA-&gt;VA
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">ntdll</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nl">dll</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="err">$</span><span class="mi">1000</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">:</span><span class="err">$</span><span class="mi">1000</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//FOA-&gt;VA
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">ntdll</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nl">dll</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="err">#</span><span class="mi">400</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">:</span><span class="err">#</span><span class="mi">400</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">当module为空字符串时(如:$1000),默认为当前CPU窗口显示的模块</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h3 id="模块入口点" class="heading-element"><span>模块入口点</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a8%a1%e5%9d%97%e5%85%a5%e5%8f%a3%e7%82%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>可以使用下述命令来获取模块的入口点.</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">module:entry、module:oep、module:ep</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">当模块中有名为entry、oep或ep时,将返回这个导出函数的地址.</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h2 id="表达式" class="heading-element"><span>表达式</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a1%a8%e8%be%be%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>调试器允许使用基本表达式.除了计算之外,还允许使用类C语法进行变量赋值.</p>
<h3 id="运算符" class="heading-element"><span>运算符</span>
 <a href="#%e8%bf%90%e7%ae%97%e7%ac%a6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ol>
<li>圆括号/方括号:(1+2),[1+6]比其他运算有优先权</li>
<li>一元负号/二进制非/逻辑非:-1,~1,!1</li>
<li>乘法/除法:2*3,6/3,5%3</li>
<li>加法/减法:1+3,5+2</li>
<li>左/右移动/轮换:1&laquo;2,10&raquo;1,1&laquo;&lt;2,1&raquo;&gt;2</li>
<li>小于(等于)/大于(等于):4&lt;10,3&gt;6,1&lt;=2,6&gt;=7</li>
<li>等于/不等于:1==1,2!=6</li>
<li>二进制与:12&amp;2</li>
<li>二进制异或:2^1</li>
<li>二进制或:2|8</li>
<li>逻辑与:0&amp;&amp;3</li>
<li>逻辑或:0||3</li>
<li>逻辑隐含:0-&gt;1</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="快速赋值" class="heading-element"><span>快速赋值</span>
 <a href="#%e5%bf%ab%e9%80%9f%e8%b5%8b%e5%80%bc" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>更改内存、变量、寄存器或标志.</p>
<ul>
<li>a?=b:?可以是任何非逻辑运算符.a可以是任何寄存器、标志、变量或内存位置.b可以是被确定为表达式的任何东西.</li>
<li>a++/a&ndash;:a可以是任何寄存器、标志、变量或内存位置.</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="表达式函数" class="heading-element"><span>表达式函数</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a1%a8%e8%be%be%e5%bc%8f%e5%87%bd%e6%95%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="字符串" class="heading-element"><span>字符串</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ad%97%e7%ac%a6%e4%b8%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">示例命令</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">结果</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ansi(addr[, count])</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr打印以空字符结尾的ANSI字符串.当count指定时,字符串将被截断.</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{ansi(0x402000,10)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">Hello XiaLuoHun!</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">utf8(addr[, count])</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr打印以空字符结尾的UTF-8字符串.当count指定时,字符串将被截断.</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{utf8(0x402000)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">Hello XiaLuoHun!</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">utf16(addr[, count])</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr打印以空字符结尾的UTF-16字符串.当count指定时,字符串将被截断.</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{utf16(0x405000,2)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">He</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">strstr(str1, str2)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">查找子字符串</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{strstr(utf8(0x402000),&ldquo;Luo&rdquo;)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">streq(str1, str2)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">比较两个字符串</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{streq(utf8(0x402000),&ldquo;Luo&rdquo;)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">strlen(str)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">计算字符串的长度</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{strlen(utf8(0x402000))}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">10</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="模块" class="heading-element"><span>模块</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a8%a1%e5%9d%97" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.party(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr的模块编号.0表示用户模块,1表示系统模块</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.base(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr模块基址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.size(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr模块大小</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.hash(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr模块Hash</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.entry(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr模块入口</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.system(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是属于系统模块.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.user(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是属于用户模块.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.main()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取主模块基地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.rva(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr所属模块的RVA.若地址不在模块中,返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.offset(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr的文件偏移量.若地址不在模块中,返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.isexport(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是否是模块导出函数.若是返回1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mod.fromname(str)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取str模块基址</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="进程信息" class="heading-element"><span>进程信息</span>
 <a href="#%e8%bf%9b%e7%a8%8b%e4%bf%a1%e6%81%af" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">peb()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取PEB地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">teb()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取TEB地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">tid()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取当前线程ID</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">kusd(),KUSD(),KUSER_SHARED_DATA()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取KUSER_SHARED_DATA结构地址</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="常规函数" class="heading-element"><span>常规函数</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b8%b8%e8%a7%84%e5%87%bd%e6%95%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">示例命令</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">结果</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">bswap(value)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">反转字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{bswap(0x12345678)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">78563412</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ternary(condition, val1, val2)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">如果条件为真, 返回val1,否则返回val2</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{ternary(0,1,2)}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">2</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">GetTickCount()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取从操作系统启动所经过的毫秒数</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{GetTickCount()}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">121A1D0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">rdtsc()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取RDTSC指令结果,该指令返回CPU自启动以来的时钟周期数</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{rdtsc()}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">5C51E17C</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">isdebuggerfocused()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断是否聚焦x64dbg.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{isdebuggerfocused()}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">isdebuggeefocused()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断是否聚焦调试程序.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{isdebuggeefocused()}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">0</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="内存" class="heading-element"><span>内存</span>
 <a href="#%e5%86%85%e5%ad%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mem.valid(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是否有效.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mem.base(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr内存页的基地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mem.size(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr内存页的大小</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mem.iscode(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是否是可执行页面.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">mem.decodepointer(ptr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">调用了API DecodePointer</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="反汇编" class="heading-element"><span>反汇编</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%8d%e6%b1%87%e7%bc%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.len(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr指令长度</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.iscond(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处是否为条件指令(JCC).若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.isbranch(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处是否为分支指令(JCC/CALL).同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.isret(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处是否为RET指令.同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.iscall(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处是否为CALL指令.同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.ismem(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处指令是否有内存操作数.同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.isnop(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处是为NOP指令.同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.isunusual(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处是为异常指令.同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.branchdest(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr处的分支目标地址(即在addr处按下Enter键后的地址)</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.branchexec(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处分支是否执行.若是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.imm(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr处指令中的立即数</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.brtrue(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr处的分支目标地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.brfalse(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">如果addr处是条件跳转指令则返回下一条指令地址,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.next(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr处下一条指令地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.prev(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr处前一条指令地址</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.iscallsystem(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处的指令是否进入系统模块.如是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.mnemonic(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">返回addr处指令的助记符(str).可以和字符串表达式函数配合使用,如str.streq(dis.mnemonic(cip), &ldquo;cpuid&rdquo;)</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.text(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">获取addr处的指令文本</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">dis.match(addr, str)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr处指令是否匹配正则表达式str.如是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>

 <a href="#%e8%b7%9f%e8%b8%aa" class="heading-mark">

 </a>

 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">tr.enabled(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是否启用了跟踪覆盖.如是返回1,否则返回0</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">tr.hitcount(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断addr是否已被跟踪覆盖.同上</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">tr.isrecording(),tr.runtraceenabled()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">判断是否启用跟踪记录.同上</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="内存指针" class="heading-element"><span>内存指针</span>
 <a href="#%e5%86%85%e5%ad%98%e6%8c%87%e9%92%88" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ReadByte(addr),Byte(addr),byte(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr读取1字节并返回</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ReadWord(addr),Word(addr),word(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr读取2字节并返回</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ReadDword(addr),Dword(addr),dword(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr读取4字节并返回</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ReadQword(addr),Qword(addr),qword(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr读取8字节并返回(仅限x64)</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ReadPtr(addr),ReadPointer(addr),ptr(addr),Pointer(addr),pointer(addr)</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从addr读取一个指针(4/8字节)并返回</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>

 <thead>

 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ex.firstchance()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">最后一个异常是否为首次偶发异常</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ex.addr()</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">最后一个异常地址.即导致异常的指令地址</td>

 <td style="text-align: left">ex.code()</td>

 </tr>
 <tr>

 <td style="text-align: left">最后一个异常信息计数(参数个数)</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">ex.info(index)</td>

 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>

<h2 id="变量-1" class="heading-element"><span>变量</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>调试器支持以下三种类型的变量:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>用户变量:用户通过var/mov创建变量</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>系统变量:由x64Dbg创建的变量,可读可写,但不能删除</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>只读变量:由x64Dbg创建的变量,可以读取,但不能写入和删除</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="设置变量" class="heading-element"><span>设置变量</span>
 <a href="#%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>可以通过以下方式进行变量设置</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C" data-lang="C"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">mov</span> <span class="n">myvar</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1234</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">mov</span> <span class="err">$</span><span class="n">myvar</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1234</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">myvar</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1234</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">$</span><span class="n">myvar</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1234</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="保留变量" class="heading-element"><span>保留变量</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%9d%e7%95%99%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>
<p><code>$res</code>/<code>$result</code>:常规结果变量</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$resN</code>/<code>$resultN</code>:可选的其他结果变量(N=1-4)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$pid</code>:被调试进程的PID</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$hp</code>/<code>$hProcess</code>:被调试进程的handle</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$lastalloc</code>:alloc命令的最后结果</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$breakpointcondition</code>:控制条件断点命中时的暂停行为</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$breakpointcounter</code>:断点命中的次数</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>$breakpointlogcondition</code>:条件断点的日志条件.它不能用于控制日志记录行为</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="条件断点" class="heading-element"><span>条件断点</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9d%a1%e4%bb%b6%e6%96%ad%e7%82%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>当断点命中时,x64Dbg将执行下述操作.</p>
<ul>
<li>将系统变量$breakpointexceptionaddress设置为触发断点的地址(内存地址)</li>
<li>将命中计数器增加1</li>
<li>将系统变量$breakpointcounter设置为命中计数器的值</li>
<li>如果设置了中断条件,计算表达式的值(默认为1)</li>
<li>如果设置了快速恢复且中断条件为0:
<ul>
<li>跳过接下来的步骤继续执行被调试对象,这也将跳过执行插件回调和GUI更新</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>如果设置了日志条件,计算表达式的值(默认为1)</li>
<li>如果设置了命令条件,计算表达式的值(默认为1)</li>
<li>如果中断条件求值结果为1(或非0值):
<ul>
<li>打印标准日志消息(如果断点设置为静默,则不支持标准日志消息)</li>
<li>执行插件回调</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>如果设置了日志文本且日志条件表达式求值结果为1(或非0值):
<ul>
<li>格式化并打印日志文本(参考字符串格式化)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>如果设置了命令文本且命令条件表达式求值结果为1(或非0值):
<ul>
<li>将系统变量$breakpointcondition设置为中断条件</li>
<li>将系统变量$breakpointlogcondition设置为日志条件</li>
<li>执行命令文本</li>
<li>将中断条件设置为<code>$breakpointcondition</code>的值.因此,如果在脚本中修改<code>$breakpointcondition</code>的值,你就能控制调试对象是否被中断</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>如果中断条件求值结果为1(或非0值):
<ul>
<li>中断调试对象并等待用户继续执行</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p>如果上述条件表达式无效,则将触发该条件.(即无效的条件表达式作为条件将导致断点始终中断、打印日志以及执行命令)</p>
<p>在平时的调试过程中,命中计数器的值会无条件进行递增,可以调用下述API函数进行重置.</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//对addr处命中计数器的值进行重置.若hitCount未指定,默认为0
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">ResetBreakpointHitCount</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">addr</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">hitCount</span><span class="p">)</span> 
</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>条件表达式示例如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//永不中断的条件断点
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//当EAX和ECX都为1时中断
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">EAX</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span><span class="n">ECX</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//当第一个参数为1时中断
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">arg</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//当EAX是一个有效地址时中断
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">mem</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">valid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">EAX</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//当命中计算器的值为3时中断
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="err">$</span><span class="n">breakpointcounter</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//当线程ID为0x1C0时中断
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">tid</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="n">C0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//当ECX指向一个包含LuoHun的UTF-16字符串时中断
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="n">strstr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">utf16</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ECX</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s">&#34;LuoHun&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="条件跟踪" class="heading-element"><span>条件跟踪</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9d%a1%e4%bb%b6%e8%b7%9f%e8%b8%aa" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>当跟踪命中时,x64Dbg将执行下述操作:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>将跟踪计数器增加1</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>将系统变量$tracecounter设置为跟踪计数器的值</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>如果设置了中断条件,计算表达式的值(默认为0)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>执行插件回调(允许插件更改终端条件)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>如果设置了日志条件,计算表达式的值(默认为1)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>如果设置了命令条件,计算表达式的值(默认为中断条件)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>如果设置了日志文本且日志条件表达式求值结果为1:</p>
<ul>
<li>格式化并打印日志文本(参考字符串格式化).要将日志重定向到文件,请使用TraceSetLogFile</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>如果设置了命令文本且命令表达式求值结果为1:</p>
<ul>
<li>将系统变量$tracecondition设置为中断条件</li>
<li>将系统变量$tracelogcondition设置为日志条件</li>
<li>执行命令文本</li>
<li>将中断条件设置为<code>$tracecondition</code>的值.因此,如果在脚本中修改<code>$tracecondition</code>的值,你就能控制调试对象是否被中断</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>如果中断条件求值为1:</p>
<ul>
<li>打印标准日志条件</li>
<li>中断调试对象并等待用户继续执行</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p>如果想要通过日志跟踪记录所有指令的地址和汇编,可以使用下述命令</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{p:cip} {i:cip}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">当使用跟踪步过时,即使条件为真,被调试对象也不会在已跳过的调用中暂停.如果需要暂停应使用跟踪步进</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h2 id="字符串格式" class="heading-element"><span>字符串格式</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ad%97%e7%ac%a6%e4%b8%b2%e6%a0%bc%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>基本语法如下:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-C++" data-lang="C++"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//?是表达式可选的类型
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//若要在结果中输出{ 或 },可将它们转义为{{ 或 }}
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="p">{</span><span class="o">?:</span><span class="n">expression</span><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>简单类型如下:</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">类型</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">示例命令</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">结果</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">d</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">有符号十进制</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{d:FFFFFFFF}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">-1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">u</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">无符号十进制</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{u:FFFFFFFF}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">4294967295</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">p</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">零前缀指针</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{p:0x401000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">00401000</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">s</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">字符串指针</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{s:0x402000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">&ldquo;Hello XiaLuoHun!&rdquo;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">x</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">十六进制</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{x:0x10}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">10</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">a</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">地址信息</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{a:0x401000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">x32dbg.00401000</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">i</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出汇编指令</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{i:0x405102}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">call 0x0040B122</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">f</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">单精度浮点指针或寄存器</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{f:0x401000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">9.86338</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">F</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">双精度浮点指针或寄存器</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{F:0x401000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">3.72778552425271e-095</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<p>复杂类型如下:</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">语法</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">含义</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">示例命令</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">结果</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{mem;size@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从address开始打印size个字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{mem;2@0x400108}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">504A</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{winerror@code}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出Windows错误码名称以及描述</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{winerror@0x5}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">ERROR_ACCESS_DENIED:拒绝访问.</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{ntstatus@code}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出NTSTATUS错误码名称以及描述</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{ntstatus@0}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">STATUS_SUCCESS:STATUS_SUCCESS</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{ascii[;length]@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">以ascii编码进行解析,从address开始打印length个字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{ascii;10@0x00402000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">Hello XiaLuoHun!</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{ansi[;length]@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">以ansi编码进行解析,从address开始打印length个字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{ansi;c@0x00402000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">Hello XiaLuo</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{utf8[;length]@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">以utf8编码进行解析,从address开始打印length个字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{utf8;10@0x00402000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">Hello XiaLuoHun!</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{utf16[;length]@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">以utf16编码进行解析,从address开始打印length个双字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{utf16;2@0x00405000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">He</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{disasm@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出address处的汇编,同{i:address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{disasm@0x405102}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">call 0x0040B122</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{modname@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出address所属的模块名</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{modname@0x401000}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">x32dbg.exe</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{bswap[;size]@value}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">从value的低位开始倒数打印size个字节</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{bswap;1@0x12345678}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">78</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{label@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出address处的标签</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{label@0x405102}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">OptionalHeader.AddressOfEntryPoint</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">{comment@address}</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">输出address处的注释</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">log &ldquo;{comment@0x405107}&rdquo;</td>
 <td style="text-align: left">XiaLuoHun</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="参考链接" class="heading-element"><span>参考链接</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a href="https://help.x64dbg.com/en/latest/introduction/Values.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">x64Dbg帮助文档</a></p>

item.title: Arthas
item.description:
<img src="https://XiaLuoHun.top/posts/java/arthas/images/%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8Carthas-boot.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://XiaLuoHun.top/posts/java/arthas/images/arthas.png" alt="arthas" srcset="https://XiaLuoHun.top/posts/java/arthas/images/arthas.png?size=small, https://XiaLuoHun.top/posts/java/arthas/images/arthas.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://XiaLuoHun.top/posts/java/arthas/images/arthas.png?size=large 2x" data-title="arthas" style="--width: 320px;--aspect-ratio: 320 / 105;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>Arthas是一款线上监控诊断产品,通过全局视角实时查看应用load、内存、gc、线程的状态信息,并能在不修改应用代码的情况下,对业务问题进行诊断,包括查看方法调用的出入参、异常,监测方法执行耗时,类加载信息等,大大提升线上问题排查效率.</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/alibaba/arthas"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/alibaba/arthas</a></p>
<h2 id="测试代码" class="heading-element"><span>测试代码</span>

 </a>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-java" data-lang="java"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">package</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">demo</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">java.util.ArrayList</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">java.util.List</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">java.util.Random</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kd">public</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">class</span> <span class="nc">MathGame</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
